sentence.Network_en: These are the opposite sides of the parallelogram.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是平行四边形的对边.

sentence.Network_en: This construction is often called the parallelogram law of addition of vectors.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种作图法常被称为矢量相加的平行四边形法则.

sentence.Network_en: We can show that u ( x, t ) can be determined at every point inside the parallelogram OACB.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以证明,u ( x, t ) 可以在平行四边形OACB内部的每一点上被定出.

jx.jx_en_mean: a parallelogram illustrating the theorem that if two forces acting at a point are represented in magnitude and direction by two sides of a parallelogram meeting at that point, their resultant is represented by the diagonal drawn from that point

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French parallélogramme, via late Latin from Greek parallēlogrammon, from parallēlos 'alongside another' + grammē 'line'

entry.def: A parallelogram is a four-sided shape in which each side is parallel to the side opposite it.

means.word_mean: 1. a quadrilateral whose opposite sides are both parallel and equal in length
